Message:
I dreamt of being a witch
when I grew up.

My earliest memory is
a wild horse making
my five short years of life
flash before my eyes.

Then, a swirling dark robe
and a glimmer of starlight.

Before those hooves
could stave in my head,

she appeared, gallantly
driving away the horse
with a mysterious power.

It would’ve been understandable
if I’d turned away,
shielding my eyes
against the inevitable...

but I saw everything.
She saved my life...with magic.

...And no sooner
had she rescued me,
than she departed.

Even as I watched her go,
she shined ever so brightly.
